4312200.name: Presto!
4312200.description:
Presto! is an N64-style collectathon that combines classic 3D platforming gameplay with the physics-based Rolling Globe that allows Presto to roll around, bounce, and take-off on ramps at high speeds! Presto will explore surreal worlds where he collects the lost magic of his circus troupe's past to restore the troupe to its former glory. Play casually at your own pace, or optimise your route, collecting everything, to earn the best rank possible at the end of each stage.

A new adventure that can be experienced like the legendary classics of the past. Presto! delivers an uncomprising 3D platformer with plenty of collectibles, rewards for high-skill gameplay, and a variety of unique worlds to visit.

  • Explore - Branch out from a charming and compact hub world into varied, surreal environments that all provide their own set of unique challenges. Find all 5 Memory Cores in each world to open the gateway back home

  • Rolling Globe - Mount the Rolling Globe at any time to roll down hills, launching off ramps, and bounce around to reach new heights

  • Collect - Pick up Stars, break them out of containers, and knock them out of enemies

  • Ranks - Play as skillfully as you can, as quickly as you can, collecting all the Stars and Memory Cores, and tally it all up at the end-of-level ranking system. Can you get all of the illusive 'P' ranks?

  • Replayability - Didn't get the rank you wanted? Try again and again, optimising your route to your hearts content, discovering new short-cuts and techniques you might not have noticed before

  • Nostalgic + Modern - Play the game with a classic CRT TV filter with multiple built-in presets, or in full, crisp native resolution... or anything in between
4312200.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
